Reviews.Title: COMPLICATED
Reviews.Author: gove-lewis
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA IS MORE DIFFICULT TO INSTALL AS IT HAS MORE BELLS & WHISTLES. TOOK SOME TIME TO GET THE PICTURE & ANGLE WE WANTED. GOOD CAMERA JUST NOT PLUG AND GO.

Reviews.Title: More than expected. 3x optical zoom is great!
Reviews.Author: Wency
Reviews.Content: I am glad to have this camera replace existing camera . I have to say I like its adorable appearance , the white housing looks like noble quality. I mounted this one above my front door in the entry and tied it into the security DVR. The resolution is outstanding. Definately an improvement from the 400TVL I was using before.It is good enough for day N night vision. 30LED IRs quite bright and intense - could be pointed outwards a bit more. The picture is excellent, and even on a moonless night with the porch lights off, the picture is as bright and clear as a sunny day.It's nice to see who is at the door and to watch for those tricky boys played on my yard.Excellent distance viewing but the only other qualm I have is that it can't really be adjusted to get the right angle and adjust optical zoom, if you are setting it up near your eaves.Anyway, Still could just be fine tuning and personal taste. For the price, it is a good camera; does the job for a couple of weeks. Beyond my expected. Hope it can be work for a long time, i will update my review if there is something happened , i recommend it so far.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup and great night vision
Reviews.Author: Sharoline
Reviews.Content: This is my first LOFTEK Camera. Very nice look and good build quality. It is pretty easy to set up, just need to connect it to my DNR and power on it. Simple to operate that's CCTV camera attract me. And this camera works very well at night. The IR lights are very bright. I install it outside to monitor my passageway, I can see it very clear at night. if it remain high quality night version for several month, I think I will purchase more.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera! Awesome video quality!
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: I have 3 cameras set up and connect to my CCTV System, this is the fourth one i purchased and it is the best one ever used. It seems like it's good enough for my application. I impressed by its perfect video quality. Pretty good camera, it come with a 1/3 SONY lens the colors are accurate. IP 66 also satisfied me so much, pretty good for outdoor use.

Reviews.Title: good quality camera
Reviews.Author: RambodN
Reviews.Content: Good quality, fair price, easy to install , compare with other camera on market meet all the requirement, IR is so good and clear to see most of thing in dark

Reviews.Title: Well made and good performance.
Reviews.Author: ZechariahB
Reviews.Content: Great CCTV for the money.  These are heavy duty outdoor dome cameras.  The actual dome is NOT impact resistant.  After several days in 120 degree temeratures and extreme sun rays these do not withstand impact.  No matter what surveillance system you use these do work well under multiple environment situations.  Heat though is a big problem in the area these went and they tend to burn out faster in extreme heat.  These do operate great though and have an excellent set of features.  The heavy guage housing provides excellent baseball bat protection.  The color and resolution are as expected.  Tested this unit against a similar CCD and resolution that was over 600 dollars and sadly this works better, so bang for the buck I would trust LOFTEK equipment for most surveillance installations.  Remember, no matter how many cameras you have, if someone wants to break it they will, not before being recorded and used in court for prosecution.  YES GOOD GUY ONE....BAD GUY ZERO.

Reviews.Title: Excellent night vision and sharp picture!
Reviews.Author: Abraham
Reviews.Content: My brother purchased this to upgrade from 400 tv line cameras supplied with the DVR. The difference in quality is incredible. The day time view is crisp, clear and vivid. The night IR view is even clearer. What's more , the control cable can adjust monitor view. I will replace the others with these.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful optical zoom .Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Mars
Reviews.Content: Great camera- got it as just an added security feature for my current apartment, and it works so well. I later found out that it's the same camera that the bar I waitress at uses for their security monitors.The highlight is her optical zoom for less than 100bulks , there are many cameras with the same feature more than 150bulks on Amazon , the price is really decent , i would like buy more.Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: it looks good  but sorry ..  it doesn't work for me
Reviews.Author: Kn Arizona
Reviews.Content: bad night vision ,not cover much wide angle, no instruction what so ever how to install, no customer service. not recommend

Reviews.Title: Very good picture quality
Reviews.Author: KerS
Reviews.Content: Great quality of the colors and image detail both day and night (IR). The night vision work wells and "lights" up my entire yard in front of the camera. The quality of the enclosure is good too, made of a strong aluminum housing and sealed electronics. Good for surveillance CCTV needs.

Reviews.Title: Wide view angle ,recommened it !
Reviews.Author: M.J
Reviews.Content: I brought this camera because its a CCTV camera has zoom lens.It up to my expectations.The picture is very clear at day time. As it come with 3mm-8.5mm lens , i can adjust the lens to focus the camera and change the view angle. The night version is amazing .It deserved 5 start. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Non-standard mount
Reviews.Author: theclient
Reviews.Content: If you are going mount this on the wall and drill a hole through the wall you shouldn't have any trouble. If you want to surface mount and run pipe from the hole provided forget it, the cable has a block (which does nothing) on it and it will not fit through the hole and there is no place under the mount to secure your connections. It is also a non-standard size box and you will need to buy an extra large square box to mount it under the camera and make your connections in there. It is not 360 adjustable, if you need to adjust right and then lower right it won't. No instructions included just a spec sheet. My lens came with some scratches on it on the inside, looks like it was done from the LEDs. The picture looks comparable to others.

Reviews.Title: This is a security Camera Period.
Reviews.Author: Sally J. Goltzman
Reviews.Content: Under description, it says able to email snapshots.  You can't.  I thought you might be able to track movement.  You can't.  There is no CD or directions whatsoever.  I went to the company website and did a search for this model "Venus-7H" and found nothing.  Over a week ago, I sent customer service an email regarding questions.  The website says they will respond to all emails within 72 hours. Still waiting...The camera itself seems a bit of a mixed bag.  The housing itself seems quite hardy.  The video is good quality.  As mentioned by another review, my plastic lens surrounding the camera was scratched but I should be able to avoid these scratched spots as the camera will be in a fixed position and the plastic can be rotated.  Will the plastic dome discolor like plastic has a tendency to do over time?  Who knows?As for being "waterproof":  There appears to be O-rings and seals on the bottom to prevent water from coming in.  On the top where the unit is mounted to a wall or ceiling, it appears vulnerable to water leakage.  The cable is unable to fit through the opening on the side allowing you to mount flush.  This also will cause pinching of the cable coming out of the top when mounted.  With the mount not being flush that also increases the likelihood of leaking from the top as flush mounting is necessary to prevent water from potentially leaking from the top.I will try to keep an eye on it.  If it starts filling up with water or starts forming condensation, I might drill a whole directly through the bottom of the plastic bubble to allow water to escape.  Of course this would mean the camera trying to avoid the hole by looking in another direction.While I have not made adjustments, there appears to be a lever for zoom and a lever for focus accessed by removing the housing.  You can also make manual (only) adjustments by loosening the side screws on the inside bracket.  If you want to make further adjustments, you can remove the side screws, pop loose of the bracket and then loosen the bottom portion of bracket.

Reviews.Title: Camera is just ok.
Reviews.Author: Chip
Reviews.Content: Camera was easy to install, looks nice mounted and was easy to adjust.  The VFL was not all that great.  I am using in a back porch situation.  Distance about 15' from camera.  Zoomed out all the way barely covers porch, a small 20.00 bullet camera did a better job covering.  Then after getting all the way out, it was still to close to focus, I had to use the camera in a different area and buy something else for the porch.  Quality of video was good, but again if in a tight spot do not use this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awful Camera
Reviews.Author: Texas Red
Reviews.Content: Terrible night vision, got reflection off dome.  Don't bother with this if that is your application.  The build quality is good and looks nice, but didn't work for my night application.

Reviews.Title: great resolution
Reviews.Author: shopper01
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, I just wish the angle on the lens had a little more range.  Tested with Q-See recorder.  How about a built in mic option?

Reviews.Title: Terrible wide angle options/NO 12V Power ADAPTER
Reviews.Author: Eman
Reviews.Content: This camera has a terrible wide angle view. It doesnt cover much at all and I would not recomend it. Its fine for a super small area, close up but that sort of defeats the purpose of it having an optical zoom adjustment anyways.It also comes with NO 12V POWER ADAPTER. You have to go out and buy your own. All my other CCTV Cameras came with the whole kit (ie: Power Adapter included). Good luck on even testing it out if you cant plug it in. What a joke.Buy something else.

Reviews.Title: Better then I had expected!
Reviews.Author: BahamaBoi
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 to try on my home surveillance system day/night view is mind blowing for a $80 camera, great picture quality only down side is if its pointing at shinny object like my car you get some sun shine lines on the screen I thought the camera was defective but its just the fact that it doesn't do well with sun light bouncing off silverish objects during the day. I'm happy over all and just bought 4 more to add to my system!!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT USE OUTSIDE AT NIGHT
Reviews.Author: EVE MC "Evelyn"
Reviews.Content: Camera has the absolute worse night picture I have seen... ive installed hundreds of cameras in the last ten years and customer wanted these because they look real "tough"...sure they look great during the day but at night they are useless....avoid- get a GW Security camera for same price.

ProductInfo.Features:
LOFTEK 1/3" Sony CCD camera ; 700 TV lines
Vari-Focal 3.5~8mm manual lens ; WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) ;OSD Menu
Built in IR motion detection triggers instant emial snapshot alert
Auto Gain Control ; Electronic Shutter Adjustment
Great for outdoor security, Waterproof grade:IP66
ProductInfo.Name: LOFTEK® 1/3" Sony 700TVL Lines Waterproof Outdoor Surveillance CCTV Camera Color CCD Day Night Vision Security Bullet Dome Camera and 30 Infrared LEDs with 3x Optical Zoom
